question.name: study005_comparison
question.displayName: EPO Regulated Targets - Truncated EpoR allele

paramRef.help: Select an E1 cell with either a wild-type or truncated EpoR allele.

question.summary: Find genes which are differentially expressed in E1 (CFU-E) erythroid progenitors with a truncated EpoR allele in control and rhEPO treated samples.
question.description:
Find genes which are differentially expressed in E1 (CFU-E) erythroid progenitors with a truncated EpoR allele in control and rhEPO treated samples or between wild type and EpoR-truncated genotypes.

These data come from the %%study005_name%% study.

First choose an experiment, then choose your reference and alternative conditions.

Choose the directionality and the magnitude of the (raw) fold difference.
For example, selecting up-regulated with a fold difference of 2 will only show results where the expression level of the comparator is twice that of the reference.

If a comparison returns no result with a high-confidence filter, rerun setting the confidence value to 'Any'.

columnAttribute.name: log2_fold_change
columnAttribute.help: log2 fold change calculated as the difference between the log2 mean of the alternative and the log2 mean of the reference condition

columnAttribute.name: log2_reference_mean
columnAttribute.help: mean log2 mRNA expression level for the reference condition

columnAttribute.name: log2_alternative_mean
columnAttribute.help: mean log2 mRNA expression level for the alternate, comparison condition

columnAttribute.name: fold_change
columnAttribute.help: fold change based on raw mRNA expression levels

columnAttribute.name: reference_mean
columnAttribute.help: mean mRNA expression level for the reference condition

columnAttribute.name: alternative_mean
columnAttribute.help: mean mRNA expression level for the alternate, comparison condition

columnAttribute.name: log2_confidence_interval
columnAttribute.help: [log2 lower, log2 upper] 95% confidence interval on fold change. Most useful for interpreting fold changes less/greater than +/-2. If the interval is broad or lower and upper limits have opposing signs, then the there is less confidence in the fold change value.

columnAttribute.name: p_value
columnAttribute.help: p-value uncorrected for multiple hypothesis testing

question.name: study005_expression

paramRef.help: Select a treatment - EPO Challenge or Control

question.summary: Find genes expressed in EPO Challenged and Control E1 (CFU-E) cells with either a wild-type or truncated EpoR allele.
question.description:
Find genes by ranked expression levels in EPO Challenged and Control E1 (CFU-E) erythroid progenitor cells with either a wild-type or truncated EpoR allele. These data are from the %%study005_name%% study.

Select a genotype and one or more treatment.

columnAttribute.name: sample
columnAttribute.help: sample associated with top-ranked expression (out of selected samples in search)

columnAttribute.name: percentile
columnAttribute.help: ranked percentile across all genes expressed in this condition for the experiment

columnAttribute.name: mean_expression
columnAttribute.help: mean log2 mRNA expression level for the selected condition

columnAttribute.name: standard_error
columnAttribute.help: standard error on the mean log2 expression
